translations: n.贴身男仆；用车的人；伺候客人停车
vt.为……管理衣物；替……洗熨衣服

phrs.translation: 洗熨服务，送洗服务；特快洗衣服务

sentences.sentence: Admission is $30. Valet parking will be available.
sentences.translation: 门票是30美元，提供代客泊车服务。

sentences.sentence: Set up a "Valet Parking" sign in front of the store.
sentences.translation: 店门前，放一块标志牌“代客泊车”。

sentences.sentence: "Forgive me," one 2006 winner said, "I wrote this on my valet parking ticket."
sentences.translation: 2006年一位获奖者说：“不好意思，我写在汽车罚款单上了。”
